alert.note: Alert for Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 2:21PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Polk County through 315 PM EDT... At 220 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Wales, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Winter Haven, Haines City, Bartow, Lake Wales, Auburndale, Fussels Corner, Combee Settlement, Jan Phyl Village, Medulla, Poinciana, Lake Alfred, Crooked Lake Park, Dundee, Davenport, Eagle Lake, Lake Hamilton, Hillcrest Heights, Highland Park and Homeland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central Florida.
